item.description:
THE OFFICIAL DYKE MARCH AFTER PARTY
PRIDE WEEKEND - FRIDAY JUNE 10th



Just a short stroll across the street, Dyke Night and UltraBoston bring you a party at Felt Nightclub sure to kick off your Pride Weekend with style. The women will take over the 2nd and 3rd floors for this special event featuring complimentary appetizers from 9-10 pm (full dinner menu available for order until 10pm), DJ Maryalice, and amazing entertainment by silk-ribbon aerialist who will be... performing mid air between the second and third floors.

FELT’s third floor holds 6 colorful billiard tables, a lounge area, and a bar overlooking the 2nd floor below. FELT's second level lounge and bar’s eclectic plush decor creates a funky environment. Complete with 2 billiard tables, a New York Style lounge and playful lighting, this floor is the perfect place for lounging, dancing or a little game.

Just a short walk from the Boston Common, this event is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March so show your support! Validated parking discount $10 all night after 4:00pm at LaFayette Parking Garage (directly across from Felt)-Must get validation from Felt.


FELT Nightclub, 533 Washington Street Boston, MA 02111 21+,

More Information: www.dykenight.com
Find Us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/dykenight
Follow US on Twitter: www.twitter.com/dykenight

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: THE OFFICIAL DYKE MARCH AFTER PARTY
